name: band-consumer
description: 🆕 A boilerplate for building Cosmos-SDK based blockchain w/ oracle data from BandChain

name: Codefox
description: Quick coding and highlighting tool using the rextester service for compiling programs written in the supported languages. Built using Electron.

name: Cpp-Optimization-Algorithms
description: C++ implementation of various optimization algorithms meant to aid students in understanding the logic and code evolution. For students by students :P

name: Cross-Chain-Crawler
description: Cross-Chain-Crawler: a cute spider, rating and analyzing sites you request him to for safety and sentiment analysis. This project can also be named an initiative towards a 'Blockchain of Trust'

name: CryptoStats-Feed
description: Cryptocurrency Feed with IPFS integration for storage and file sharing

name: Data-Dignity
description: Data is ever-flowing, but the value it has is rarely discussed. This repo provides materials discussing Data Dignity.

name: huginn
description: Create agents that monitor and act on your behalf.  Your agents are standing by!

name: Internet-HP
description: Firefox extension for checking the overall Internet health points(HP) and performing scans for unsafe websites.

name: republic-of-trust
description: Republic of Trust is a smart contract for voting and analyzing sites on the web for a safer experience.

name: Skymask
description: Client for generating and managing temporary emails made with the 1secMail service. It allows to store attachments in a decentralized manner via Skynet.

name: Spyce
description: Circuit simulator using Python : it is going to have an OCR feature -> take a photo of the circuit and the program will atempt solving it

name: Student-Assembly
description: Application meant to give voice to students worldwide without fear of censorship. Built with NEAR protocol.
